title: Harvey Weinstein-Inspired “Horror Film” In Works By Director...
content: Harvey Weinstein-Inspired “Horror Film” In Works By Director Brian De Palma   The director of Carrie, Blow Out and Dressed To Kill told Le Parisien that he’s working on a screenplay for an unnamed French producer.
contentWithMarkup:
Harvey Weinstein-Inspired “Horror Film” In Works By Director Brian De Palma

The director of Carrie, Blow Out and Dressed To Kill told Le Parisien that he’s working on a screenplay for an unnamed French producer.
